skins.shipDescription: Cannon-class Destroyer Escort - Eldridge, Hull Number DE-173!
skins.selfIntroduction: Eldridge, Cannon-class destroyer escort. Love snacks. Emit sparks. Can't teleport...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, look! I can emit sparks!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, fly. (Eldridge raises her arms up towards you.)
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... (Eldridge's expression hasn't changed, but her hair is charging up to shock you.)

skins.shipDescription: Merry Christmas... Commander, Eldridge's outfit... cute?
skins.acquisition: Merry Christmas... Commander, Eldridge's outfit... cute?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, present? (Eldridge's hair twirls in anticipation)

skins.shipDescription: Commander, do you like Eldridge...this way? Meow~...look what I've done to my books...
skins.acquisition: Commander, do you like Eldridge...this way? Meow~...look what I've done to my books...
skins.login: Commander, want to listen to music...with Eldridge?
skins.details: Commander...won't you be joining Eldridge for class?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Not being by the Commander’s side while at school, interesting...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Everyone at school gets charmed by Eldridge’s cute gaze...Eldridge is elated!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Sakura Empire's New Year looks fun... Go together...? (Eldridge is looking at you expectantly.)
skins.acquisition: Commander, Sakura Empire's New Year looks fun... Go together...? (Eldridge is looking at you expectantly.)
skins.details: These clothes, pretty. But hard to hug. Sad...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, hair bun, big... Want to touch it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, cherry flower. Watch. (Eldridge's lock of hair is taking the form of a cherry flower petal.)

skins.JPClientName: ニャンニャンアイドル？
skins.shipDescription: Eldridge and the kitties... are in idol mode... Commander, do you like...?
skins.acquisition: Eldridge and the kitties... are in idol mode... Commander, do you like...?
skins.login: Commander, Eldridge... has become a kitty...
skins.details: Eldridge... supercharged idol... (the sparks around Eldridge shift regularly)
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander... don't forget to... support Eldridge...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, bad. (Eldridge flicks your forehead with her cowlick)
